roleset.name: think about

example.name: thinking out loud
example.text: David Lindsey, chairman of the Fat Tire Bike celebration, muses that the bike's popularity may be a combination of technology and nostalgia.
example.arg: David Lindsey, chairman of the Fat Tire Bike celebration,
the bike's popularity may be a combination of technology and nostalgia.

example.name: PP thought
example.text: All this causes Rep. Hyde to muse about an alternate way to drum up more enthusiasm.
example.arg: about an alternate way to drum up more enthusiasm.

roleset.note: MUSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'muse' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from muse.01-v predicate notes)
